titleStmt.title: The myrrour or glasse of Christes passion
Speculum passionis Domini nostri Jesu Christi. English
titleStmt.author: Pinder, Ulrich, d. 1510 or 1519.
Fewterer, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete strete, at the sygne of the George, by me Robert Redman,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC.xxx.iiii. [1534] The. xii. day of December]

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Pinder, Ulrich. Speculum passionis Domini nostri Jesu Christi.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reel 54 and at 1663 (same copy filmed twice).
